creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Municial workers restoring electricity supply in Lyman, Donetsk region. It is essencial for locals in winter as they can use electrical heaters to warm their appartments. The city was occupied by Russians and liberated by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in October 2022. The humanitarian situation remains difficult, as remaining residents have no access to gas and water, and limited access to electricity. The city was severely damaged during fighting, majority of buildings were destroyed. These days, Russian army continue shelling Lyman, killing civillians and destroing more houses almost daily.
